name: Smile For Me - Official Artbook
detailed_description:
You’ll see many lovely images, from character concepts to environment concepts - even the Habitat's posters are here! A must for curious customers captivated by the art of Smile For Me!

Includes:

  • 55 pages chock-full of in-game art!
  • Detailed concept art, layouts, and character sketches
  • Notes and commentary from the developers
  • DRM-free pdf for your collection!
about_the_game:
You’ll see many lovely images, from character concepts to environment concepts - even the Habitat's posters are here! A must for curious customers captivated by the art of Smile For Me!

Includes:

  • 55 pages chock-full of in-game art!
  • Detailed concept art, layouts, and character sketches
  • Notes and commentary from the developers
  • DRM-free pdf for your collection!
short_description: The magical mysteries behind Smile For Me... revealed...?! An original art book chock-full of concept art, in-game assets, artist commentary, and more! Special-made for you and your beautiful eyes.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Any
  • Processor: Anything at all. Go hog wild.
  • Memory: 1 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nope
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
  • Sound Card: No, actually
  • Additional Notes: Any computer that can display a pdf will be fine. Really.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Any
  • Processor: Yes
  • Memory: 1 MB RAM
  • Graphics: No
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
  • Sound Card: No
  • Additional Notes: Any computer that can display a pdf
